entities.name: CodingKnowledge
observations: Central hub for transferable programming knowledge and solutions
Collects reusable patterns, techniques, and solutions that apply across multiple projects
Green node in knowledge graph for easy identification
Examples: logging solutions, state management patterns, optimization techniques
Focus on solutions that can be adapted and reused in different project contexts
Bridges specific project insights to general programming knowledge
Repository of best practices and proven techniques

entities.name: ConditionalLoggingPattern
observations: Logger class with conditional console output based on log levels
Enables debug visualization conditional on runtime log levels
Pattern: Check Logger.getActiveLevels() for dynamic state checking
Implementation: Use IIFE pattern for render-time level checking
Benefits: Production debugging without performance impact
Transferable to any project needing conditional debug output
From ConditionalDebugRendering in TimelineProject

entities.name: ReduxStateManagementPattern
observations: Redux Toolkit implementation with typed hooks for React applications
Organized into feature-based slices (ui, timeline, repository, preferences)
State persistence integrated at slice level for user preferences
Serializable check disabled for complex objects (Three.js)
Central state management pattern for complex applications
Transferable to any React application needing predictable state
From Redux Store Architecture in TimelineProject

entities.name: ThreeJSReactIntegrationPattern
observations: React Three Fiber integration pattern for 3D visualizations
Singleton pattern for cross-component state coordination
Global event listeners managed by component lifecycle
Performance optimization through viewport-based filtering
Camera state persistence with simple obfuscation
Transferable to any React application needing 3D graphics
From Three.js Integration in TimelineProject

entities.name: MCPKnowledgeIntegrationPattern
observations: MCP (Model Context Protocol) integration for persistent knowledge graphs
Direct memory operations bypass local file simulation
Automated knowledge capture from git hooks and session analysis
Bidirectional sync between local storage and MCP memory
UKB/VKB command pattern for knowledge management workflow
Transferable to any development workflow needing knowledge persistence
From CodingKnowledgeBase system

entities.name: TimelineProject
observations: 3D timeline visualization application
Built with React, Three.js, Redux Toolkit
MVI architecture pattern
Development period: May 26-28, 2025
Language: TypeScript

entities.name: KnowledgeManagementProject
observations: Automated knowledge capture and visualization system
Built with bash scripts, Python, MCP integration
Supports git hook automation and session analysis
Development period: May-June 2025
Language: Bash, Python

entities.name: ReactPerformanceOptimization
observations: Common issue: unnecessary re-renders
Solution: React.memo for component memoization
Solution: useMemo and useCallback for expensive computations
Solution: Proper dependency arrays in hooks
Key learning: Always profile before optimizing

entities.name: ViewportFilteringOptimization
observations: Problem: Rendering performance in 3D timeline with many events
Solution: Distance-based viewport filtering for Three.js
Technique: Only render events visible in current camera view
Result: Reduced load from all events to ~20-50 visible events
Key learning: Spatial optimization crucial for 3D performance

entities.name: CrossPlatformBashScripting
observations: Problem: Date command differences between macOS and Linux
Solution: OS detection with [[ $OSTYPE == darwin* ]]
Technique: Conditional syntax for date parsing
Pattern: Always provide fallback commands for robustness
Key learning: Test scripts on target platforms early

entities.name: MCP
observations: Model Context Protocol for persistent knowledge graphs
Enables cross-session memory for AI assistants
Supports entity-relation graph structures
Integrates with Claude Code development workflow

entities.name: ThreeJS
observations: JavaScript 3D graphics library
React Three Fiber integration for React apps
Excellent for data visualization and interactive experiences
Performance considerations for large datasets
